1. HUAWEI MatePad Pro 13.2" – Flagship OLED, top-tier performance/features.  
2. Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE – Strong all‑rounder, large display, S Pen support.  
3. Google Pixel Tablet – Modern Android tablet with smart‑display dock features.  
4. Apple iPad mini – Premium compact tablet, very strong performance/ecosystem.  
5. Acer Iconia Tab P10 – Solid mid‑range 10" media tablet.  
6. LG G Pad IV 8.0 FHD – Older mid‑range, decent but dated.  
7. Alcatel 3T10 2020 – Entry‑level tablet, basic performance.  
8. Chuwi HiPad X Keyboard (accessory, not a tablet) – Ranked last since it’s only a keyboard.

1. HUAWEI MatePad Pro 13.2" – flag‑level OLED, large 13.2" screen, strong specs.  
2. Google Pixel Tablet – modern Tensor chip, dock/smart display functionality, long support.  
3. Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE – big 12.4" display, S Pen support, good performance.  
4. Apple iPad mini – very powerful small tablet, but smaller screen, more niche.

8. Chuwi HiPad X Keyboard – accessory only, no tablet hardware by itself.

1. HUAWEI MatePad Pro 13.2" – flagship OLED display, pen support, strong performance, premium build.  
2. Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE – large 12.4" display, S Pen in box, good performance and ecosystem.  
3. Google Pixel Tablet – solid performance, clean Android, great dock/smart-display use, but smaller display than 1–2.  
4. Apple iPad mini – very strong chip and ecosystem, but small screen vs others for media/productivity.  
5. Acer Iconia Tab P10 – decent 10.4" 2K display and battery, but mid-range performance.  
6. LG G Pad IV 8.0 FHD – compact and light but older hardware and smaller FHD display.  
7. Alcatel 3T10 2020 – basic large-screen tablet, modest specs and older platform.  
8. Chuwi HiPad X Keyboard accessory – just a keyboard for a tablet, not a tablet itself, so ranked last.

1. HUAWEI MatePad Pro 13.2" – Flagship‑class large display, powerful hardware, premium features.  
2. Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 FE – Strong performance, S Pen, large high‑quality screen, good all‑rounder.  
3. Google Pixel Tablet – Modern chip, clean Android, smart‑home dock functionality.  
4. Apple iPad mini – Very powerful compact tablet; smaller screen but top‑tier performance.  
5. Acer Iconia Tab P10 – Solid mid‑range: 10.4" 2K display, Kompanio 500, decent RAM/storage.  
6. LG G Pad IV 8.0 FHD – Older 8" FHD tablet, lighter specs vs newer options.  
7. Alcatel 3T10 2020 – Entry‑level 10" tablet, basic performance and features.  
8. Chuwi Hipad X (keyboard page) – Budget‑oriented; weaker overall experience than others above.
